Package cea.util.metrics

Class QuantileSummary

  • java.lang.Object
    • cea.util.metrics.QuantileSummary
  • public class QuantileSummary
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements the weighted quantile sketch algorithm ( https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf )

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      QuantileSummary()  
      QuantileSummary​(java.util.ArrayList<Pair> multiSet)
      Constructor that used a multi-set of (value , weight) to initialize the 4-tuple (S, rplus, rminus, omega) and weight sum (omegaSum)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double computePercentile​(double p)
      Compute the approximated percentile based on the quantile summary
      QuantileSummary dataToQS​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> data)
      Put a vector of time record into a quantile summary (the weights are by default 1)
      double getEpsilon()  
      double getOmegaSum()  
      java.lang.String getQuantile()  
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getS()  
      void merge​(QuantileSummary otherQ)
      Merge two quantile summaries into one without increasing the approximation error
      int omegaExtended​(int y)
      Omega function with extended domain (according to DEF A.2 in APPENDIX https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf)
      void prune​(int b)
      Reduce the number of elements in the summary to b+1.
      int rMinusExtended​(int y)
      rMinus function with extended domain (according to DEF A.2 in APPENDIX https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf)
      int rPlusExtended​(int y)
      rPlus function with extended domain (according to DEF A.2 in APPENDIX https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf)
      java.lang.String toString()

    • Method Detail

      • dataToQS

        public QuantileSummary dataToQS​(java.util.Vector<TimeRecord> data)
        Put a vector of time record into a quantile summary (the weights are by default 1)
        Parameters:
        data - vector of time record
        Returns:
        a quantile summary that corresponds to the multi-set of (value = record , weight = 1)

      • rPlusExtended

        public int rPlusExtended​(int y)
        rPlus function with extended domain (according to DEF A.2 in APPENDIX https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf)

      • omegaExtended

        public int omegaExtended​(int y)
        Omega function with extended domain (according to DEF A.2 in APPENDIX https://arxiv.org/pdf/1603.02754.pdf)

      • merge

        public void merge​(QuantileSummary otherQ)
        Merge two quantile summaries into one without increasing the approximation error

      • prune

        public void prune​(int b)
        Reduce the number of elements in the summary to b+1. Then, the approximation error increases from epsilon to epsilon + 1/b
        Parameters:
        b -

      • computePercentile

        public double computePercentile​(double p)
        Compute the approximated percentile based on the quantile summary
        Parameters:
        p - a number between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        the p-th percentile

      • getQuantile

        public java.lang.String getQuantile()
        Returns:
        a string of the approximated quantile based on the quantile summary
